monitoring.title: Monitoring

platforms.question: What platforms does QDT support?
platforms.answer: QDT supports all major BI platforms including Tableau, Looker, Power BI, and Metabase. We're continuously adding support for new platforms based on user needs.

monitoring.question: How does real-time monitoring work?
monitoring.answer: QDT uses advanced APIs and connectors to continuously monitor your dashboards. It tracks performance metrics, data freshness, and user interactions in real-time, alerting you to any issues as they occur.

alerts.question: Can I customize alert thresholds?
alerts.answer: Yes, QDT allows full customization of alert thresholds. You can set specific criteria for different dashboards, metrics, and user groups, ensuring you're notified only when truly necessary.

security.question: How secure is QDT?
security.answer: QDT implements enterprise-grade security measures including end-to-end encryption, role-based access control, and regular security audits. We comply with major security standards and best practices.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support, regular training sessions, and detailed documentation. Enterprise customers also get access to dedicated support teams and custom training programs.
